CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Healthcare Group (Public) relative to Zenith Medical Foundation?
SRP.A: Meridian Healthcare Group (Public) is {below} Zenith Medical Foundation in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Public Health relative to Meridian Healthcare Group (Public)?
SRP.A: Stellar Public Health is {below} Meridian Healthcare Group (Public) in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Healthcare Group (Public) relative to Stellar Public Health?
SRP.A: Meridian Healthcare Group (Public) is {above} Stellar Public Health in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total healthcare expenditure?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Public Health}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total healthcare expenditure?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Healthcare Group (Public)}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Healthcare Group (Public)'s minimum Healthcare Expenditure in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Healthcare Group (Public)'s minimum Healthcare Expenditure is in {1973}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Medical Foundation's maximum Healthcare Expenditure in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Medical Foundation's maximum Healthcare Expenditure is in {1995}.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1974, was the average total Healthcare Expenditure higher or lower than between 1980 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total healthcare expenditure between 1971 and 1974 was {lower} than between 1980 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1993, did the total Healthcare Expenditure experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total healthcare expenditure between 1973 and 1993 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1978, did the total Healthcare Expenditure experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total healthcare expenditure between 1972 and 1978 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Healthcare Expenditure in 1978 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total healthcare expenditure in 1978 was {lower} than in 1985.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Stellar Public Health} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Public Health and Zenith Medical Foundation first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Public Health and Zenith Medical Foundation first exchanged leading positions in {1970}.
